entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • restore failing on Alpine arm32 #35676
  • APICompat should warn for nullable-enabled implementation of nullable-disabled base member #35667
  • dotnet publish fails on indirectly referenced "Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web"-project #35656
  • Container tooling doesn't understand the rtm channel #35647
  • [NETSDKE2E]Publishing blazorwasm project failed with AOT compilation = true after upgrading to .NET 6.0.318(Oct update) #35645

PullRequests

Created

  • IDE0017 "Object initialization can be simplified" cleanup #35679
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0200 "Lambda expression can be removed" cleanup #35678
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0002 "Name can be simplified" cleanup #35675
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade MSBuildLocator ref from 1.6.1 to 1.6.10 #35662
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • branding update for 8.0.2xx #35661
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload commands: JSON only output adjustments #35640
    untriaged, breaking-change, Area-Workloads, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

Merged

  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Avoid running new APIs under older TFMs #35636
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Containers: support using OCI base images. #35609
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • [wasm] Remove `UsingMicrosoftNETSdkBlazorWebAssembly` from Wasm SDK #34166
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • Fix version of targeting pack #35620
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • We don't need this 🙃 #35594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Skip getting Windows GUI bit on non-Windows in AppHostShellShimMaker #35600
    Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, 8.0.1xx

Updated

  • IDE0049 "Name can be simplified" cleanup #35680
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update RID parsing's `LastIndexOf` call to use invariant culture #35637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2274284 #35586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Meaningful error on runtime identifier mismatch in project.assets.json #35491
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
